channel.title: Simplicity is a form of art... - rc

item.title: Showing return code in PS1
item.description: If you do daily management on Unix/Linux systems, then checking the return code of a command is something you'll do often. If you do SELinux development, you might not even notice that a command has failed without checking its return code, as policies might prevent the application from showing â€¦
item.dc:creator: Sven Vermeulen
